archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.3.9: When creating virtual instances additional security measures should be considered, such as virtual trusted platform modules (vTPMs), to provide hardware-based security techniques that support encryption.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
